pregnancy 0.0.0.9000

pregnancy

This is a work-in-progress R package for tracking dates and medications in pregnancy and fertility treatment. It is in the early stages of development.

Update 2023-03-25: After a long hiatus, I am now actively returning to work on this project. The R code will be getting a major overhaul. All the package best-practices, like documentation, tests, vignettes, a pkgdown website etc, are also forthcoming. And there’ll be a hex sticker too!
